newsitem.title: PAKISTAN: Pakistan auctions 13 bln rupees of six-month bonds.
newsitem.headline: Pakistan auctions 13 bln rupees of six-month bonds.

text.p: The State (central) Bank of Pakistan said on Monday it had auctioned six-month short-term federal bonds worth 13.04 billion rupees at a weighted average yield of 17.07121 percent per year.
The bank received bids worth a total of 14.08 billion rupees out of which bids for 13.04 billion rupees were accepted.
In the previous auction held on April 22, bids worth 4.696 billion rupees were accepted at a weighted average yield of 17.29545 percent per year.
